sourcesContent:
<template>
    <button v-on="listeners" v-bind:type='type' :class="{btn:true, 'btn--outlined':outlined}">
        <slot></slot>
    </button>
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        // eslint-disable-next-line vue/multi-word-component-names
        name:'Button',
        props:{
            type:{
                type:String,
                default:'button'
            },
            outlined:{
                type:Boolean,
                default:false
            }
        }
    }
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
.btn{
    display: inline-block;
    font-size: 18px;
    background: #ff662d;
    color:#fff;
    cursor: pointer;
    min-width: 220px;
    border: 1px solid transparent;
    padding: 8px 15px;

    &--outlined {
        background: none;
        border: 1px solid #ff662d;
        color:#ff662d;
    }
}
</style>
